post_title: moved to eBay: Piedmont 150 portraits (near complete subset)
post_content:
The group is missing the big 3 portraits plus Waddell, Walsh, and Young for a complete Piedmont 150 portrait subset.

I'm open to offers on groups. Prices are firm for single cards. If you want scans of any of the others, just provide me the phone number or email address where you would like them sent. Whatever doesn't sell I will probably list for auction quite soon, so let me know if you want me to hold anything for you. 

Scans of the first several cards are posted below to give you an idea of my grading, but I do have scans of all of them, so just ask if you want to see anything else.
